alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 15 at 3:35PM AKST until January 17 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FROM VALDEZ THROUGH THOMPSON PASS... * WHAT...North winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 100 mph possible. * WHERE...Valdez and Thompson Pass. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds could move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong pressure gradient will develop across Northeast Prince William Sound Tuesday night into Wednesday. Gusts as high as 100 mph are possible through Thompson Pass with gusts to 75 mph possible in Valdez.
info.instruction: A high wind watch means there is potential for a hazardous high wind event. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
